channel.title: Applications on Juniqe Cloud And Infrastruture Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Applications on Juniqe Cloud And Infrastruture Documentation

item.title: Checkout app
item.author: asdrubal@juniqe.com (Asdrubal Gonzalez Penton)
item.description: Checkout cart staging: https://www.staging.juniqe.com/cm/#/ production: https://www.juniqe.de/cm/ Logs: https://sentry.io/organizations/juniqe/issues/?project=5272619 Run checkout tests Run in browser from localhost npm run test:local Run in headless Chrome from localhost npm run test:local:headless Run in browser against Staging test:juniqe-staging npx testcafe chrome qa/tests/functional.js --selector-timeout 50000 --assertion-timeout 20000 --page-load-timeout 15000 -e The preferred domain can be selected by --domain=de or domain=com local dev with shop integration Start local dev env with shop and nginx-frontend, for example cd ~/workspace/juniqe-infra/docker docker-compose up -d Start checkout app npm install npm start Open http://www.
